text: “Ia damazir okavɨrɨziba, egha ia gumazir igharaziba tuavim men akakaghasa! Iavzika, ia bar ikuvigham! Ia kamaghɨn gumazamizibar sure gamua ghaze, ‘Gumazir manam guizɨn mɨkɨmsɨva, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn akakagh mɨkɨmtɨ, an araziba pura bizim. Egh gumazir kam guizɨn mɨkɨmsɨ, golɨn Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven itibar akakagh mɨkɨmtɨ, kar a guizbangɨra mɨgei, egh a mɨkemezir arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ, a damu.’
